name: W10/10 Light Runner
description:
Week Ten. Game Ten.

Have you ever wanted to travel at the speed of light and destroy planets? Well, now you can, with Light Runner. Travel from the sun to the planets in the Solar System in real time! Can you manage to play the game for more than 4 hours in order to reach Neptune and destroy it? As you move through the Solar System, you'll need to dodge rockets by pressing W and S or Up and Down. Don't ask where the rockets come from, or why they will stop a planet destroying ball of fire. If you would prefer to turn the rockets off, press R. Pause the game by pressing P.
